p: Souza et al. [ 47] studied quercetin-loaded lecithin/chitosan nanoparticles as a functional food. The UV–Vis absorption spectra of free quercetin and quercetin NPs were obtained at the spectral range of 200–700 nm at 1.0 nm intervals. M. Esmaili et al. [ 48] studied UV-visible spectra of curcumin in the presence of various concentrations of Beta casein-micelle as a nano vehicle.
